title: Siren Song
description: When Chloe Karras sings, she knows that no one can resist her sensual allure-except for the sexy naval officer seemingly immune to her voice. But Captain Alex Shore is just the man she wants to take home after her performance-until he tells her what she thought were imagined powers are real...and dangerous.Alexandros knows firsthand how seductive sirens are, as well as their potential to destroy. Yet the former sea soldier feels a powerful attraction to the beautiful rock singer that goes beyond her spell. Can he banish Chloe from the town he's vowed to protect-or will he be drawn into the siren's bed?
author: Stephanie Draven
